metadata.title: CVE-2014-125014 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in FFmpeg 2.0. Affectedby this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the component HEVCVideo Decoder. The manipulation leads to memory corruption. The attack canbe launched remotely. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
